metadata.name: Sunset in Montenegro
metadata.description:
“Via Montenegro” is a series of videos and photographs captured while traveling through my home country - Montenegro. 

From mountains to streets, seaside and countryside, to unique moments and heavenly views.

You could say it’s a slice of life, my life. It’s all the moments I like coming back to.
I decided to share these moments with you, with the idea to promote this tiny Balkan country and its wild beauty, but also to share this amazing footage and photos I am selfishly holding onto. Enjoy, and come visit!

--

"Sunset in Montenegro" is a short video I captured with my DJI Osmo Pocket while experiencing a breathtaking view on the seaside of Montenegro. 

3840x2160px, 4K / MP4 VIDEO

--

See more on my Instagram - @lukapsd
